Setting.Name: Loader::Agent::CommonJS###999-ZnunyCISearch
Setting.Description: List of all JS files which are loaded to provide the CI search for the agent interface.

Setting.Name: PreApplicationModule###ZnunyCISearch
Setting.Description: This configuration defines a PreApplication module to enable Znuny-CISearch in all views.

Setting.Name: ZnunyCISearch::SearchParams###Prefix
Setting.Description: This configuration defines a prefix that will be used for the CI search.

Setting.Name: ZnunyCISearch::SearchParams###Suffix
Setting.Description: This configuration defines a suffix that will be used for the CI search.

Setting.Name: ZnunyCISearch::SearchParams###FallbackDefaultClassName
Setting.Description: This configuration defines a global default class that will be used for the CI search if no other class can not get determined.

Setting.Name: ZnunyCISearch::SearchParams###DefaultClassName
Setting.Description: This configuration defines a mapping of role to class name that is used as default class for the CI search.

Setting.Name: PreferencesGroups###DefaultClassName
Setting.Description: Defines the config parameters of this item, to be shown in the preferences view.
